Plot: Eric Love (O'Connell) is a 19 year old teenager who is so violent he has been 'Starred Up' (Moved to Adult prison) where he finds his father Neville (Mendelsohn) who Eric hasn't seen since ...
Title: Starred Up
Actors: Jack O'Connell, Gilly Gilchrist, Frederick Schmidt, Edna Caskey
tomatoConsensus: Smart, hard-hitting, and queasily realistic, Starred Up is an instant classic of U.K. prison cinema.
